content:
ITEM NO.24               COURT NO.12               SECTION IV-A
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
SPECIAL LEAVE PETITION (CIVIL) Diary No(s). 3023/2021
[Arising out of impugned final judgment and order dated  05-01-2021
in WA No. 3829/2019 passed by the High Court of Karnataka at 
Bengaluru]
PRIYA KRISHNA                                      Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
THE RETURNING OFFICER & ORS.                       Respondent(s)
FOR ADMISSION and I.R. 
IA No. 148846/2025 - CONDONATION OF DELAY IN REFILING /  CURING THE
DEFECTS
 
Date : 07-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM :  HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE PANKAJ MITHAL
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K.V. VISWANATHAN
[PARTIAL COURT WORKING DAYS BENCH]
For Petitioner(s)  Mr. Mahesh Thakur, AOR
                   Ms. Vedika Singh, Adv.
                   Mr. Ranvijay Singh Chandel, Adv.
                                  
For Respondent(s)  
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
In view of the letter circulated by learned counsel for the
petitioner seeking adjournment, the matter be listed after two
weeks.
(VARSHA MENDIRATTA)                             (NIDHI MATHUR)
COURT MASTER (SH)                             COURT MASTER (NSH)
